structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Liability Of Executors, Etc., As Trustees
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 8, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 140, Sec. 59. See 2012, 140, Sec. 66.] Debts, legacies, goods, effects or credits due from or in the hands of an executor or administrator as such may be attached in his hands by trustee process.
